title: Exterminators win international gold award for environmental leadership and best practices
body_lines: Exterminators Limited, pest management environmental enhancement technology company won an international gold award for environmental leadership and best practices at a glittering presentation ceremony held at The Houses of Parliament, London. The awards ceremony was organized by the UK based ‘Green Organization’ – an international, independent, non-political, non-profit environmental group dedicated to recognizing, rewarding and promoting environmental best practices around the world. The award honours organizations that demonstrate environmental best practices. This year’s awards witnessed more than 500 nominations from across geographies. Exterminators was recognized globally for its leadership in environmental best practices and sustainable carbon neutral programs winning the ‘Green Apple Environmental Gold Award’ for the second time.
